summary: This bill, the Strengthening State and Local Efforts to Counter Transnational Repression Act, aims to enhance state and local law enforcement capabilities to combat transnational repression and related terrorism threats. It mandates the Secretary of Homeland Security to develop a training program focused on identifying and responding to these threats. The bill also includes provisions for information sharing, community awareness briefings, research and development, and a Comptroller General review of the implementation.
